text: Kuya mbona pfighoda pfe undewa pfawakalile awala iweng'ighwe uwetso wa kuhigha. Kuya mbona muhe tse iwanu iwachinjighwe kwa kulapfa ukalangama wa mbuli tsa Yesu, na Imbuli ye Imulungu. Wawo ng'awamtamanile imnyama yula mkali na chinyagho chake, na ng'awekighwe bae chitango chake mna pfihanga pfawo au mna ghamoko ghawo. Tsawawa waghima keli, na tsawatawala na Kiristu kwa miyaka elufu imwe.
